cause.description:
This Organisation will focus on Enhancing Health Care Facilities in Jammu and Kashmir, India. It will focus on R and D in the field of medical science and simultaneously in bringing best technical assistance to the Doctors of Valley. It has also demarcated land for construction of Hospital which needs proper funding channels so that state of art medical facility can be provided to the masses. We all as members of this cause can assist, help Jhon Hopkins and Similar level Hospitals to throw some light to deprive areas of the world.
1. Medical System (Hospitals) in Kashmir is in the worst state of affairs and needs to be checked.
2. There exists lack of medical technology while Valley produces many doctors for Gulf Countries.
3. Technical assistance and exchange programs for enhancing medical culture
cause.mission: Enhance Health Care Facility in Jammu and Kashmir, India
cause.name: Health is Wealth, (J&K)
